selectStatements.query:
SELECT 
    'REQ BU'                                  driving_dim_code, 
    tl.organization_name              dimension_value,
   TO_CHAR(o.organization_id)  dimension_value_code
FROM 
    dw_internal_org_d o, 
    dw_internal_org_d_tl tl 
WHERE 
    o.REQUISITION_BU_FLAG = 'Y' 
    AND o.organization_id = tl.organization_id 
    AND tl.language = 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.USER_LANGUAGE_CODE)'
